wikipedia_page.main: John Royston Evans (born 9 February 1939) is a Welsh footballer, who played as a winger in the Football League for Chester and Halifax Town.

response: Royston Macauley "Mac" Evans (13 January 1884 – 12 March 1977) was an Australian sportsman. He played both cricket and soccer for Western Australia. As a cricketer, Evans played 11 first-class matches for the Western Australian state team between 1907 and 1924. Playing as an all-rounder, Evans made 270 runs at an average of 15.00, and took one wicket, at an average of 214.00.Royston Evans player profile – CricketArchive. Retrieved 14 October 2011. He captained the side against the MCC in October 1924.Western Australia v Marylebone Cricket Club, 25, 27, 28 October 1924, at the WACA Ground – CricketArchive. Retrieved 14 October 2011. He also played cricket for the North Perth Cricket Club in the WACA District competition.
